content.text: Match ends, Mallorca 2, Albacete 0.
Second Half ends, Mallorca 2, Albacete 0.

Substitution, Mallorca. Filip Markovic replaces Manuel Arana.

Substitution, Mallorca. Javi Ros replaces Cristian Bustos.
